item.description:
Come check out the new 4.0 Essentials Box Set at Toys N Things starting at 2PM on Saturday Sept 11th. Designed for 1â€“5 players, this boxed game contains everything needed to start playing D&D, including rules for creating heroes, advice for playing the Dungeon Master, a solo play adventure, and group-play adventure content.
Several different character races (dwarf, elf, halfling, and human) and classes (cleric, fighter, rogue, and wizard) are presented, along with powers for each race and class.
D&D Essentials is designed to make starting and playing a D&D game quick and easy.

After checking out the "Red Box", you can play in the game day scenario Sunderpeak Temple. Long a bastion of good, Sunderpeak Temple has fallen to an unknown force. The second level adventure focuses on journeying to the temple, learning what has happened there, and defeat what has taken over the temple. Bring your own character or used one of the our pregens.

As with past Meetups light snacks and refreshments will be served.

Look forward to seeing BD&D members at the meetup.

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: 4.0 Essentials Game Day and Meetup at Toys N Things
